Author: jeykehey
Text: that sounds incredibly overwhelming and upsetting, and im so sorry you have to go through it. and no, youre not too sensitive, the behavior you described is plain rude and hurtful. you deserve better people in your life and more importantly you deserve the food your body needs to function. dont let anyone make you feel otherwise.   youre not weak for being upset by how youve been treated and i hope you find the strength to continue to treat yourself well instead of falling into old habits. my pms are open if you ever need to talk to someone <3
